mapper.insert:
select max(mknid)+1 from mk_note
insert into mk_note(mknid,mknotecontent,mkcstid,mkuid)values(#{mid},#{mknotecontent},#{mkcstid},#{mkuid})
mapper.select: select mn.mknid,mn.mknotecontent,mn.mkuid,mn.mknctime,mkss.mkcsid,mkss.mkcstid,mkss.mkcsname,count(mf.mknid) count from mk_note mn left join mk_soncourse_section mkss on mn.mkcstid=mkss.mkcstid left join mk_Fabulous mf on mn.mknid=mf.mknid where mn.mkuid=#{param1} group by mn.mknid

select mkc.mkcsid,mkc.mkctitle,mkdf.mkdfname,mkc.mkctime,mkc.mkclearned,mkc.mkcscore,mkc.mkteacherlearwhat,mkc.mkcimg,mku.mkuname,mku.mkuimg,mku.mkuintroduce, mks.mksname,mks.mksimg from mk_course mkc left join mk_use mku on mkc.mkuid=mku.mkuid left join mk_staff mks on mkc.mksid=mks.mksid left join mk_difficulty mkdf on mkc.mkdfid=mkdf.mkdfid where mkc.mkcsid=#{param1}
